alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:04PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Reno, western Sedgwick, Harper, eastern Kingman and western Sumner Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 803 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arlington to near Kingman to near Harper to near Manchester. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingman, Anthony, Cheney, Harper, Conway Springs, Haven, Garden Plain, Pretty Prairie, Argonia, Norwich, Arlington, Viola, Yoder, Murdock, Waterloo, Milan, Bluff City, Cleveland, Danville and Freeport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
